welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nakhon Ratchasima, a city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this charming city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: NaJu (นาจู) 나주
restaurants.description: NaJu (นาจู) 나주 is a korean restaurant located in นครราชสีมา.
restaurants.address: 7 (Mittraphap Rd.), นครราชสีมา, จังหวัดนครราชสีมา 30000

restaurants.description: หอมโอชา is a noodle restaurant located in ในเมือง.
restaurants.address: ถ.จักรี, ในเมือง, นครราชสีมา

restaurants.description: Tomodaji is a japanese restaurant located in นครราชสีมา.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
